rule.description: sshd: Repeated authentication failure from external source.
MODINE IDEAL: SSH Brute Force Detected (Aggressive Attempt)
MODINE IDEAL [Zero-Day]: Unauthorized execution or drop detected (Linked to Sysmon/FIM).
MODINE IDEAL [Zero-Day]: Potential Defense Evasion - Attempt to disable security logs/services.
MODINE IDEAL [Zero-Day]: Anomalous Privilege Escalation detected (Root/Admin Elevation).
MODINE IDEAL [Zero-Day]: Critical System File Tampering (Credential Dumping Attempt).
MODINE IDEAL: Zero-Click Pattern Detected (Lateral Movement). Automated Counter-Measure Triggered!
MODINE ALERT: Critical Activity from Admin Account! Potential Identity Theft or Insider Threat.
